title: The shape of the AD curve

content.question: Which of the following is a reason why the aggregate demand curve is downward sloping?

choices.label: A higher price level decreases savings.
A higher price level decreases interest rates.
A higher price level increases exports.
A higher price level decreases imports.
A higher price level decreases real wealth.

content.answer: A higher price level decreases real wealth.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
